title: Hippie & Bohemian
description: The 70s saw Bollywood in full retro swing — Zeenat Aman’s bell-bottoms, Sharmila Tagore’s sarees with puffed sleeves, and Hema Malini’s vibrant lehengas.

title: Glam & Power
description: Glittery chiffon sarees, heavy gold embroidery, and bold statement blouses — the 80s were loud, glamorous, and unapologetically extra.

title: Pop & Playful
description: Madhuri Dixit’s iconic Anarkalis, Karisma Kapoor’s mini dresses, and Raveena Tandon’s denim jackets created a decade of playful experimentation.

title: Y2K Boldness
description: The early 2000s brought metallics, halter necks, and bold cuts. Kareena Kapoor’s 'Poo' looks made Y2K Bollywood fashion a daring era.

title: Glam Fusion
description: Deepika Padukone’s regal gowns and Sonam Kapoor’s experimental drapes reflected a time of global fashion influence.

title: Minimal & Sustainable
description: Eco-friendly fabrics, pastel tones, and chic minimalism took centre stage.

title: Street Style
description: Bollywood embraced streetwear-inspired outfits and sneakers.

title: Hyper-Smart
description: Predicted trends include tech-integrated fabrics and bold metallics.
